releases.title: LLVM 21.1.7
commands: mkdir -p $GITHUB_WORKSPACE/upload/llvm_21.1.7//clang+llvm-21.1.7-x86_64-linux-gnu-ubuntu-20.04 && ./build-riscv-tools.sh --compress --force --setup llvm --docker ubuntu:20.04 --dest $GITHUB_WORKSPACE/upload/llvm_21.1.7//clang+llvm-21.1.7-x86_64-linux-gnu-ubuntu-20.04 SHARED_CCACHE_DIR=$(pwd)/.ccache LLVM_REF=llvmorg-21.1.7 && mv $GITHUB_WORKSPACE/upload/llvm_21.1.7//clang+llvm-21.1.7-x86_64-linux-gnu-ubuntu-20.04/llvm.tar.xz $GITHUB_WORKSPACE/upload/llvm_21.1.7//clang+llvm-21.1.7-x86_64-linux-gnu-ubuntu-20.04.tar.xz

mkdir -p $GITHUB_WORKSPACE/upload/llvm_21.1.7//clang+llvm-21.1.7-x86_64-linux-gnu-ubuntu-22.04 && ./build-riscv-tools.sh --compress --force --setup llvm --docker ubuntu:22.04 --dest $GITHUB_WORKSPACE/upload/llvm_21.1.7//clang+llvm-21.1.7-x86_64-linux-gnu-ubuntu-22.04 SHARED_CCACHE_DIR=$(pwd)/.ccache LLVM_REF=llvmorg-21.1.7 && mv $GITHUB_WORKSPACE/upload/llvm_21.1.7//clang+llvm-21.1.7-x86_64-linux-gnu-ubuntu-22.04/llvm.tar.xz $GITHUB_WORKSPACE/upload/llvm_21.1.7//clang+llvm-21.1.7-x86_64-linux-gnu-ubuntu-22.04.tar.xz

mkdir -p $GITHUB_WORKSPACE/upload/llvm_21.1.7//clang+llvm-21.1.7-x86_64-linux-gnu-ubuntu-24.04 && ./build-riscv-tools.sh --compress --force --setup llvm --docker ubuntu:24.04 --dest $GITHUB_WORKSPACE/upload/llvm_21.1.7//clang+llvm-21.1.7-x86_64-linux-gnu-ubuntu-24.04 SHARED_CCACHE_DIR=$(pwd)/.ccache LLVM_REF=llvmorg-21.1.7 && mv $GITHUB_WORKSPACE/upload/llvm_21.1.7//clang+llvm-21.1.7-x86_64-linux-gnu-ubuntu-24.04/llvm.tar.xz $GITHUB_WORKSPACE/upload/llvm_21.1.7//clang+llvm-21.1.7-x86_64-linux-gnu-ubuntu-24.04.tar.xz
